testcase.system-out: Given the user Launch Url...................................................passed Then the user Verify that home page is visible successfully.................passed When the user Click on Signup Login button..................................passed Then the user verify New User Signup! is visible............................passed When the user Enter name and email address..................................passed And the user Click Signup button............................................passed Then the user Verify that ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION is visible..............passed When the user Enter the details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth.passed And the user Select checkbox Sign up for our newsletter!....................passed And the user Select checkbox Receive special offers from our partners!......passed And the user enter the First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed And the user Click Create Account button...................................passed Then the user Verify that ACCOUNT CREATED! is visible......................passed When the user Click Continue button........................................passed Then the user Verify that Logged in as username is visible.................passed When the user Click Delete Account button..................................passed Then the user Verify that ACCOUNT DELETED! is visible and click Continue button.passed
